comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: About 35 years later - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2555447278/]Spot the differences! See also: acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=412492 Equivalent artwork by our old friend John Rae, 1842: acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=447103

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: A happy coincidence - The NLI recently posted a c.1870 photo of Edmund Burke in Dublin, who was a cousin of Governor Sir Richard Bourke - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Bourke . Contemporary 140 year-old photos of cousin's statues on the opposite sides of the world - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland/8664450269/]
